analysis: The documents all pertain to the establishment and operation of Presidential advisory committees or commissions. These committees are formed to address specific issues, conduct studies, provide recommendations, and advise the President on various matters of national importance. The topics covered range from water resources and housing to telecommunications, small business, management improvement, industrial competitiveness, social security reform, the International Year of the Child, and space activities. A common element is the reliance on the Federal Advisory Committee Act for their establishment and operation.
title: Presidential Advisory Committees and Commissions
